amendment.description: Amendment reduces and then increases funding for Operation and Maintenance, Defense-Wide by $25 million in order to address funding for DOD's impact aid program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce and then increase Operation and Maintenance, Defense-Wide by 25 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Takai amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Takai amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. Takai.
